subject: Suits and Litigation
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: At the trial of her sexual harassment lawsuit against  Isiah Thomas, Anucha Browne Sanders testified that the Knicks’ coach verbally abused her almost from the day they met.
snippet: At the trial of her sexual harassment lawsuit against  Isiah Thomas, Anucha Browne Sanders testified that the Knicks’ coach verbally abused her almost from the day they met.
